directions: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F. Sift together in a large bowl the unbleached flour, sugar, baking powder and salt. Stir in the whole-wheat flour and wheat germ. Cut in shortening. Stir in the milk with a fork just until dough cleans the sides of the bowl. Knead lightly on a floured surface. Pat or roll out to 1/2-inch thickness. Cut into squares with a knife and place on an ungreased baking sheet. Bake at 450 degrees F. for 12 to 15 minutes. Serve with sweet butter and strawberry preserves. Makes 12 to 16 biscuits.
title: Whole-Wheat Biscuits
